title: Undergraduate Research
description: Architecture and urban theoretical intentions and results in the context of the Capitol of the United States - Washington, DC. This theoretical and historical study will not occur within the confines of the classroom, but directly within the 'laboratory' of the city. Class Schedule will list topic selected. Total credit limited to 12 units. 3 lectures.
prerequisites: Junior standing and current participation in Washington Alexandria Architectural Consortium off-campus program
